description: Provides the response to a manual approval request to CodePipeline. Valid responses include Approved and Rejected.

parameters.name: pipelineName
parameters.description: The name of the pipeline that contains the action.

parameters.name: stageName
parameters.description: The name of the stage that contains the action.

parameters.name: actionName
parameters.description: The name of the action for which approval is requested.

parameters.name: result
parameters.description: Represents information about the result of the approval request. The summary of the current status of the approval request. The response submitted by a reviewer assigned to an approval action request.

nested_params.name: summary
nested_params.description: The summary of the current status of the approval request.

nested_params.name: status
nested_params.description: The response submitted by a reviewer assigned to an approval action request.

parameters.name: token
parameters.description: The system-generated token used to identify a unique approval request. The token for each open approval request can be obtained using the  GetPipelineState action. It is used to validate that the approval request corresponding to this token is still valid.

nested_items.name: approvedAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp showing when the approval or rejection was submitted.
